R

removeConnection() - Method in class main.Controller
Removes the selected connection from the 4D object.
removePoint() - Method in class main.Controller
Removes the selected point from the 4D object.
removePointOfIndex(int) - Method in class object4d.Object4D
Removes the point with the index from the points of the 4D object, removes all connections which contain the point and shifts all other connections.
reset() - Method in class main.Controller
Resets everything to the initial state
rot(Point, double, String) - Static method in class handlers.RotationHandler
Rotates a point by calculating a rotation-matrix and multiplying it with the vector-values of the point.
rotate(String, double) - Method in class object4d.Object4D
Rotates a set of 4d vectors.
rotateByVector(Vector4D, double) - Method in class object4d.Point
Rotates a point around an custom axis for a certain angle.
rotateByVector(Vector4D, double) - Method in class vector.Vector4D
Rotates a 4D vector around an custom axis for a certain angle.
rotateToCoord(Object4D) - Method in class object4d.Object4D
Rotates the 4D object by calculating the rotational difference between a rotated coordinate-system and a normalized coordinate-system.
RotationHandler - Class in handlers
Utility functions for rotation.
RotationHandler() - Constructor for class handlers.RotationHandler
